features.title: Industry Filter Chips for Most Viewed Companies
features.description: Add horizontal chip list below 'Most Viewed Companies' heading to filter by industry. One chip selected at a time. Backend returns industry field - add UI chips and client-side filtering.

functional: Chip list shown below 'Most Viewed Companies' heading
Chips show 'All Industries' + unique industries from backend data
Clicking a chip selects it and filters companies instantly
Only one chip can be selected at a time
Selected chip has distinct visual style (active state)
Chips wrap nicely on mobile screens

steps: Verify chip list exists below heading
Verify 'All Industries' chip is selected (active style)
Click a specific industry chip (e.g., first non-All chip)
Verify only that industry's companies shown
Verify clicked chip has active style

preDevelopment: Fetch sample data from backend to see industry field format
Run smoke test to verify homepage loads
duringDevelopment: Manual test in browser after each change
postDevelopment: Verify shimmer animation still works on click

features.title: Fix Layout Shift on Favourite Companies Block
features.description: FavouritesList component causes CLS because it renders null during SSR/hydration and only shows content after localStorage loads on client. Reserve space during initial render to prevent layout shift.

approach: Maintain consistent height during loading state
Prevent content jump when favourites load from localStorage

functional: No layout shift when favourites load from localStorage
Smooth transition from loading to content state
Empty state (no favourites) still shows no layout shift

steps: Verify no layout shift - 'Most Viewed Companies' stays in place
Verify favourites block appears without layout shift

preDevelopment: Identify root cause in useFavourites hook timing
postDevelopment: Verify CLS improvement in DevTools Performance panel
